name: Arabica Espresso
description: Rich caramel notes with a smooth, velvety finish. Our signature espresso.

name: Vanilla Latte
description: Smooth espresso with steamed milk and a hint of vanilla sweetness.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Espresso with foamed milk and Leon's homemade caramel drizzle.

name: Cold Brew
description: Smooth, low-acidity coffee brewed cold for 14 hours. Refreshingly bold.

name: Mocha
description: Rich espresso with steamed milk and premium dark chocolate.

name: Americano
description: Espresso shots diluted with hot water for a rich cup similar to drip coffee.

name: Arabica Beans
description: Our signature arabica beans with notes of caramel and chocolate. 12oz bag.

name: Robusta Blend
description: Bold and earthy with a strong caffeine kick. Perfect for morning brews. 12oz bag.

name: Mountain Reserve
description: High-altitude beans with complex flavor profile and subtle fruit notes. 12oz bag.

name: Morning Sunrise
description: Bright and refreshing medium roast with citrus undertones. 12oz bag.

name: Sunset Blend
description: Rich evening blend with notes of dark chocolate and spice. 12oz bag.

name: Decaf Supreme
description: All the flavor without the caffeine. Notes of caramel and nuts. 12oz bag.
